title: Documentation & Help - OpenProject
content: The OpenProject documentation and help page serves as a central hub for various resources, including user guides, FAQs, use cases, a glossary, and specific guides for the Enterprise edition, project management, security & privacy, contributions, system administration, release notes, BIM, installation & operations, development, and API. Popular topics highlighted on the page include installing OpenProject, Enterprise add-ons, OpenProject hosting, and support. The page also provides links to product information, company details, development & operation resources, and comparisons to alternative project management tools. This comprehensive overview demonstrates OpenProject's commitment to providing extensive support and information to its users, covering a wide range of topics from initial setup to advanced development and API usage, ensuring users can effectively utilize the platform for their project management needs.
